Package com.gemalto.riskengine

Class GAHCore

java.lang.Object
com.gemalto.riskengine.GAHCore
public class GAHCore extends Object
This class is the entry point to IdCloud Fraud Prevention library and holds all APIs for configuration and functionality.
Since:
2.0.0

  • Constructor Details

    • GAHCore

      public GAHCore()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(GAHConfig... configs)
      Initialize the SDK by passing mandatory configurations
      • GAHCoreConfig
      • GAHGemaltoSignalConfig
      and optional configurations
      • GAHTMXConfig
      If the optional configurations are not set, these signal groups will not be initiated, hence no signal collection under these will be made. Note that initialization is one time process for an app cycle.
      Parameters:
      configs - Configuration params
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • startPrefetchSignals

      public static void startPrefetchSignals()
      Start prefetch signals. This call will collect signals and store in cache so that collection time is reduced during the actual transaction actions. It is recommended to call this method during the launch of a screen containing a transaction event such as Login, Add Beneficiary, so that signals are cached at early stage before the actual transaction is made.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setTransactionAsCritical

      public static void setTransactionAsCritical()
      Optional API. Set a transaction as critical, so that cached signal values are updated with new values. This API can be called while performing a critical transaction, i.e when a screen with critical transaction is launched so that all old signal values in the cache are force refreshed. Currently caching of Signal values are supported for ThreatMetrix and hence call this API if ThreatMetrix signal group is initialized.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setActiveSignalGroups

      public static void setActiveSignalGroups(GAHSignalGroupConstants.ISignalGroupName[] signalGroups)
      Optional API. Call this API to filter the signal groups to be collected. This API may be called at every transaction screen to collect different set of signal groups for different transactions. Not passing a signal group will result in not collecting any signals under that group. Once set, signal group and corresponding signal list will be saved and the same will be used until changed. By default all the signal groups under the group will be collected as per the configuration set during initialization(). Note that DEVICE Signal group is mandatory to get Visit ID from GAH backend. Signal groups passed to setActiveSignals() will override the Signal groups set by this API.
      Parameters:
      signalGroups - List of Signal groups to be considered for signal collection
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setActiveSignals

      public static void setActiveSignals(Map<GAHSignalGroupConstants.ISignalGroupName,List<GAHSignalGroupConstants.ISignalName>> signals)
      Optional API. Call this API to filter the signals to be collected under a Signal group. This API may be called at every transaction screen to collect different set of signals for different transactions. Once set, signal group and corresponding signal list will be saved and the same will be used until changed. By default all the signals under the group will be collected as per the configuration set during initialization(). Note that DEVICE_ID signal under DEVICE Signal group is mandatory to get Visit ID from GAH backend. Signal groups passed to setActiveSignalGroups() will override the Signal groups set by this API.
      Parameters:
      signals - Signal groups and corresponding signals list.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • isSignalCollectionCompleted

      @Deprecated public static GAHSignalGroupConstants.SignalCollectionStatus isSignalCollectionCompleted()
      Deprecated.
      Check if all signal collection is completed before requesting for Visit ID. Poll this API before calling requestVisitID(), until status is COMPLETED. This API is deprecated v2.1.0 onwards, use requestPrefetchStatus() instead to receive the callback.
      Returns:
      Status if the signal collection is completed.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • requestPrefetchStatus

      public static void requestPrefetchStatus(GAHPrefetchStatusCallback statusCallback)
      This API is to request for the prefetch status callback. Prefetch internally collects and cache some of the signals in GAH SDK in order to reduce the time during actual transactions. Recommended to proceed with the transaction only after the callback is received at the application. Maximum time for getting the callback is configurable through setSignalPrefetchTime() API in GemaltoSignalConfig class.
      Parameters:
      statusCallback - Callback with Status code and Status message
      Since:
      2.1.0

    • requestVisitID

      public static void requestVisitID(GAHResponseCallback callback)
      API to request Visit ID from IdCloud Fraud Prevention SDK. Call this API for every transaction so that risk based decision can be received before proceeding with the transaction.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback instance to get Visit ID
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • stopPrefetchSignals

      public static void stopPrefetchSignals()
      Call this API to stop caching of signals. This API can be called during a transaction screen exit where startPrefetchSignals() was called.
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getSignalValuesJson

      public static String getSignalValuesJson()
      This API is for debugging purpose, this provides list of all signals collected for getting Visit ID. This API will provide the signal list only in Debug type of build.
      Returns:
      List of signals collected by the SDK
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • getSDKVersionInfo

      public static GAHMetaInformation getSDKVersionInfo()
      API to get SDK related meta info.
      Returns:
      Meta information like version number, build number, build type etc
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • requestSignalCollectionTiming

      public static void requestSignalCollectionTiming(GAHSignalCollectionCallback callback, String config)
      Method to request IdCloud Fraud Prevention SDK to collect all signals and notify through callback when completed. This API will be used for validation purpose only and not for Development.
      Parameters:
      callback - signal collection completion callback object
      config - Testing configuration
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setCustomSignalOptionsTMX

      public static void setCustomSignalOptionsTMX(GAHProfilingOptions options)
      Optional API. Call this API to induce custom signals into ThreatMetrix signal group. If called, call before requestVisitID(), so that custom signals are considered for next risk assessment.
      Parameters:
      options - Options object with custom signals
      Since:
      2.0.0
